main.title: SBTCVM File Types:
main.text: TROM: SBTCVM Balanced ternary ROM image. (loaded into virtual RAM when run)
STREG: loads SBTCVM TROMS as sets with more flexibility.
LOG: Log file, such as assembler and vm execution logs...
main.title: General File Types:
main.text: image: general image file (fileview detects png/jpeg/gif images)
